WNL Gamers

Board games in Wootton, Bedford – your community hub for fun and connection.

Welcome to Wootton new Life Gamers

We're a community board game club meeting at Wootton New Life Methodist Church once a month to play a selection of new and old board games. All are welcome to turn up and join in.

WNL Gamers maintained by wnlgamers
